short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits time on specific websites to reduce procrastination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of losing time on distracting websites? Procrastination Blocker helps you stay focused by limiting your daily usage on specified sites. Set time limits for each website, and once you exceed the limit, a motivational page will remind you to stay on track. Ideal for enhancing productivity and reducing procrastination, this extension is easy to use and customize according to your needs. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to manage their time better.
